title: Iman Rachman Steps Down After Turbulent Week, Leaving Record Growth at IDX
body: Iman Rachman steps down as IDX chief after a volatile week that triggered trading halts, leaving behind a period of record growth.

title: Indonesia Stock Exchange Chief Steps Down After Market Turmoil
body: IDX CEO Iman Rachman resigned after a sharp market sell-off linked to an MSCI report, saying the move was needed to restore confidence.

title: Indonesia Denies US Drone Talks, Tariff Deal Hinges on Prabowo-Trump's Schedule
body: Chief negotiator Airlangga Hartarto denies Indonesia-US tariff talks has ventured into drone purchases.

title: JCI Rebounds After Brutal Selloff, Market Eyes MSCI-Driven Reforms
body: JCI rebounded on Friday after a brutal selloff, as investors cautiously returned amid MSCI-linked reforms and stabilization steps.
